### Converting County Totals

```{r}
voters14 <- read_excel("PrecinctRegisterCounts_ByCounty_GG14.xls") |> mutate(year=2014)
voters16 <- read_excel("PG16_Eligible_Active_Voters_by_County.xlsx") |> mutate(year=2016)
voters18 <- read_excel("GG18_Eligible_Active_Voters_by_County.xlsx") |> mutate(year=2018)
voters20 <- read_excel("Eligible Active Voters by County - PG20.xlsx") |> mutate(year=2020)
voters22 <- read_excel("Eligible Active Voters by County - GG22.xlsx") |> mutate(year=2022)
voters24 <- read_csv("sept24.csv") |> mutate(year=2024)
```
